trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pine Bluff
There were no other sightings in Pine Bluff on or around October 18th 2001
divs: Sighting Detailsat home went outside, got the feeling i was being watched, looked up to see it sitting there almost straight up, when i saw it, it started moving slow at first to the east, i ran in to get a cam corder came out to find it moving away faster, got what i did on film you will want to see this
